name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, ensuring robust backend systems tailored for scalability and effectiveness. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **Django REST**, and **Celery**, with hands-on experience in database management using **PostgreSQL**. Adept at employing modern monitoring tools such as **Sentry**, **Datadog**, and **Grafana** to ensure system reliability and performance optimization.

Skilled in CI/CD practices using **Git** and orchestrating containerized applications with **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment and scaling. Strong understanding of performance tuning and efficient data retrieval with **ClickHouse** and **Elasticsearch** for improved user experiences. Familiar with API design through **OpenAPI** standards.

Experienced in developing solutions within compliance frameworks, bringing a solid foundation in healthcare and financial regulations, while being committed to implementing microservices and event-driven architectures.
